info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:19PM MDT until June 01 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GUADALUPE AND EASTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES... At 219 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles northeast of Encino, or 19 miles north of Vaughn, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Milagro. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 241 and 245. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
